oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Measurements of the bremsstrahlung background in soft-x-ray appearance-potential spectroscopy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHINDE, PS
PADALIA, BD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: spectrometer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In continuation of our recent report on the design and construction of a versatile soft x-ray appearance potential spectrometer using a Cu-BeO photoelectron multiplier, the results of our measurements of the bremsstrahlung background as a function of spectrometer parameters are discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: NUCLEAR INSTRUMENTS & METHODS IN PHYSICS RESEARCH SECTION B-BEAM INTERACTIONS WITH MATERIALS AND ATOMS,82(1)196-199
